dhtmlxDataProcesor Events

OnBeforeUpdate - occurs before server request sent ( can be used for including custom client server transport system).
Argument(s) passed into handler:
- ID of item which need to be updated
- type of operation
dhxDP.setOnBeforeUpdateHandler(function(id,type) { alert("Element ID "+id+"\nOperation type: "+type); });
OnAfterUpdate - after row updated on server side.
Argument(s) passed into handler:
- ID of item which was updated
- type of operation
- new ID, for _insert_ command
dhxDP.setOnAfterUpdate(function(id,type,newID) { alert("Element ID "+id+"\nOperation type: "+type); });
